title: 显卡驱动问题
author: hk27799041
txt_content:
Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
缺少openGL 可是Intel只有更新到1.0，所以只能靠著內建openGL的方法來用
你可以再確定一次你的顯卡更新http://www.intel.com/p/zh_TW/support/detect/graphics
我當初這台Intel的筆電也不能玩(也是openGL)，可是裝了win7之後就可以了，我看你可以選擇試試看
不然這個我不知道有沒有幫助(因為我看不懂):http://cgit.nutn.edu.tw:8080/cgit/PPTDL/KYC_100326015314.PDF

replies.txt_content: 试试桌面属性那里，到最后一个标签，然后按高级，进入疑难解答那栏，把硬件加速调到左边第二或者第三格
